abstract: Returns the symbol size for the given data value. Returns `nil` if the symbol size scale is unavailable, or the value is invalid.

declaration.code:
func symbolSize

(for value: P) -> CGFloat? where P : Plottable

overview:
## Return Value

The symbol size corresponding to the data value, or `nil` if the data value is incompatible with the chart.
rawMarkdown:
--- source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/Charts/ChartProxy/symbolSize(for:) crawled: 2025-12-04T03:34:01Z --- # symbolSize(for:) **Instance Method** Returns the symbol size for the given data value. Returns `nil` if the symbol size scale is unavailable, or the value is invalid. ## Declaration ```swift func symbolSize

(for value: P) -> CGFloat? where P : Plottable ``` ## Parameters - **value**: The data value. ## Return Value The symbol size corresponding to the data value, or `nil` if the data value is incompatible with the chart.
title: symbolSize(for:)
